default.checkpoint.recover.password.mail.recover: Klik hier om je wachtwoord te herstellen.

en.checkpoint.recover.password.mail.message: An attempt to recover your password has been received. If you do not remember making such a request please ignore all further contents of this email. In order to reset your password please click on the following link and enter a new password.
